title: Can't update from Thunderbird-Android 11 to 11.1
creator: rdscorreia74
content: As stated, I can't update Thunderbird on Android from v11 to the newest v11.1. Apparently this is an App ID fingerprint issue. Has Mozilla changed the App ID from v11 to v11.1? Thanks in advance. Cheers

title: Closing Android App
creator: kevin.prawl
content: I cannot close the Thunderbird email app on Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Android 16 One UI 8.0. The back arrow in the navigation bar no long closes the app windows. Have to use the back to home center button. Is there a solution to this problem?

title: Creating your own directories – jeśli chodzi o katalogi komputerowe/foldery.  Creating your own catalogs
creator: lufa9999
content: Hello, Today I installed an app on Android 15. The program is really great and suits me very well. I have a problem. How can I create a new folder in the app? There’s a lot about it on the internet, but everything is useless. I would be very grateful for your help. Best regards, Pawel Fraczkiewicz
